Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2012 02:40PM Greenshamrock wrote: She inserted the needle and it was like a staple gun, lol! She was just trying to get samples from the lump using ultrasound guided and the needle wouldn't go into the lump and kept slipping off. She was able to get 3 samples and put them on slides but it was from the outer edges after the needle slipped off the center.
